UnifyingAPI
Class UniChannel

java.lang.Object
  UnifyingAPI.UniChannel

public class UniChannel
extends java.lang.Object

A channel of raw data from the device. Used for driver-side creation and middleware-side parsing of channel packets.

Author:
Greg Clark

packIntoByteBuffer

public final void packIntoByteBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer sensorPacket)
Write the channel packet into a ByteBuffer at the ByteBuffer's position.

Parameters:

getPackedSize

public long getPackedSize()
Retrieves the size in bytes that this channel requires when written in the channel packet format.

Returns:
number of bytes needed to store this channel in a channel packet

Returns the size of the data in bytes. Calculated from the UniElementDescriptors in this channel's UniChannelHeader.

size of the data in bytes
